        {
            "claims": [
                {
                    "claim_id": 1,
                    "claim_text": "Strong LLMs like GPT-4 can match human preferences well, achieving over 80% agreement.",
                    "location": "Abstract, Section 4.2",
                    "claim_type": "Finding",
                    "exact_quote": "Our results reveal that strong LLM judges like GPT-4 can match both controlled and crowdsourced human preferences well, achieving over 80% agreement, the same level of agreement between humans."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 2,
                    "claim_text": "LLM-as-a-judge is a scalable and explainable way to approximate human preferences.",
                    "location": "Abstract, Section 4.2",
                    "claim_type": "Conclusion",
                    "exact_quote": "LLM-as-a-judge is a scalable and explainable way to approximate human preferences, which are otherwise very expensive to obtain."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 3,
                    "claim_text": "LLM-as-a-judge can be used to swiftly evaluate human preference, serving as a promising alternative to traditional human evaluations.",
                    "location": "Abstract, Section 4.2",
                    "claim_type": "Conclusion",
                    "exact_quote": "This suggests LLM-as-a-judge is a scalable method to swiftly evaluate human preference, serving as a promising alternative to traditional human evaluations."
                },
                {
                    "claim_id": 4,
                    "claim_text": "LLM-as-a-judge can match both controlled and crowdsourced human preferences at an agreement rate exceeding 80%, achieving the same level of human-human agreement.",
                    "location": "Section 4.2, Table 4",
                    "claim_type": "Finding",
                    "exact_quote": "our results from 3K controlled expert votes and 3K crowdsourced human votes in the wild verify that GPT-4 judge match human evaluations at an agreement rate exceeding 80%, achieving the same level of human-human agreement."
                },
